sense.def:
Kar je
right
, drži in ustreza dejstvom.

seg.quote: You get full marks for getting the right answer.
You are French, is that right?
I hope I'm pronouncing the name right.

sense.def:
To be right about something
pomeni govoriti ali misliti o nečem tako, da se ujema z dejstvi.

seg.quote: Lally was right about the repairs which the cottage needed.
The arts are, as Geoffrey rightly said, underfinanced.

sense.def:
Izbira, dejanje ali odločitev je
the right one
, kadar je najboljša in najprimernejša v danih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: I thought it was the right thing to do.
Clare is obviously the right person to talk to about it.

sense.def:
Kadar položaj ni
right
, je tako ali drugače nezadovoljiv.

seg.quote: She sensed that things weren't right between us.

sense.def:
To be right to do something
pomeni biti moralno upravičen, da nekaj naredimo.

seg.quote: We were right to insist on certain reforms.
I don't think it's right to leave children alone in a house.
Many people are rightly indignant.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
right
opišemo dejanja, ki veljajo za moralno dobra in sprejemljiva.

seg.quote: One must have some principles, some sense of right and wrong.

sense.def:
Človek ali kraj, ki je
right
, ima v družbi ugled.

seg.quote: He knew all the right people.

sense.def:
Kadar je stran blaga ali drugega materiala
right
, se vidi na zunanji strani oblačila ali pohištva.

‘Right’
rečemo, kadar želimo pritegniti pozornost kakega človeka.

seg.quote: Right, open your mouth, let's have a look.

sense.def:
To have a right to do or have something
pomeni, da smo moralno ali po zakonu upravičeni, da nekaj naredimo ali imamo.

seg.quote: ...the right to strike.
They will fight for their rights.

sense.def:
Right
je ena od dveh nasprotnih si smeri, strani ali položajev. V besedi
to
je črka ‘o’ na desni strani črke ‘t’.

seg.quote: On my left was Tony Heard and on my right Allister Sparks.
Turn right off Broadway into Caxton Street.
Her right hand was covered in blood.

sense.def:
The Right
so ljudje ali skupine, ki zagovarjajo kapitalizem in konzervativizem, nasprotujejo pa socializmu.

Z izrazom
right
poudarimo natančno tisti kraj, oddaljenost ali obdobje, o katerem govorimo.

seg.quote: Our hotel was right on the beach.
Stay right here.
We took the lift right down to the basement.
They've made a right mess of that, haven't they?

sense.def:
Right
pomeni tudi takoj.

seg.quote: I'll be right back.
The Music Hall is going to close down right after Easter.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, kar se je prevrnilo,
rights itself
, se povrne v normalno lego.

seg.quote: The ship righted itself.

sense.def:
To right a wrong
pomeni odpraviti krivico ali nekomu dati odškodnino zanjo.

To get something right
pomeni nekaj pravilno narediti.

seg.quote: Get the spelling right this time.

sense.def:
Right away
pomeni takoj zdaj.

seg.quote: He had written down a list of things to do right away.

sense.def:
To be in the right
pomeni, da je tisto, kar delamo, moralno ali zakonsko prav.

cit.quote: imeti pravico na svoji istrani, imeti prav

sense.def:
Kadar bi se nekaj moralo zgoditi
by rights
, bi se moralo zgoditi, pa se ni.

cit.quote: pravzaprav, če bi bilo vse prav

seg.quote: I should by rights speak German—my mother's German—but I only know a few words.

sense.def:
Kadar ima nekdo določen položaj, naziv ali pravico do česa
in one's own right
, jo ima zaradi sebe in ne zaradi drugih.

seg.quote: He had emerged as a leader in his own right.
